short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your working time in productive and rest segments using the pomodoro technique.
short.es: Divida su tiempo de trabajo en secciones de productividad y de descanso usando la t√©cnica pomodoro.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that uses the pomodoro technique to manage your working time in periods of work and rest: 25 min. of work time, followed
by 5 minutes of rest; the fourth resting period will be longer: 15 min.
